text:
Welcome to the SellOffVacations.com email update, offering you specials and discounted prices not available on our web site.

SellOffVacations.com is Canada's number one on-line vacation web site, offering you discounts on vacation packages by Canada's biggest and best tour companies.

We sell the exact same vacation ...
staying at the same hotel ...
flying with the same airline ...
eating the same food ...
drinking the same drinks ...

but enjoying yourself that much more knowing that you booked at SellOffVacations.com and you paid much, much less than those who booked  elsewhere.

And remember that as a member of TICO (ont lic #03121291) with SellOffVacations.com your funds are safe should there be an unexpected closure or bankruptcy. Be aware that if you book your vacation directly with the airlines, cruise lines, hotels and car rental companies your money is most likely unprotected in the event of a bankruptcy.

This week if you make a reservation by CALLING our office using the numbers below you will save an extra 2% on your vacation package when you quote code C3UWTBWMU, that's 2% off the already reduced discount fares found on our web site, book by November 30, 2001.

SellOffVacations.com also handles reservations for Air Canada's Tango and West Jet Airlines ... and remember, with us your funds are protected.

============================================================
NOW YOU CAN BOOK YOUR FAVORITE HOLIDAY DESTINATIONS ON-LINE -
http://www.SellOffVacations.com
Your best source for package holidays from Canada!

416-503-1300 in the 416 / 905 area or toll free
1-877-Sell-Offs in Canada & USA

All reservations handled by:
Dream Vacations Inc. Lic# 03121291
Comments: mailto:comments@SellOffVacations.com
Mon - Fri 8am to 8pm
Sat & Sun 9am to 6pm EST
Make your reservation on-line 24 hours, 7 days a week !
============================================================
============================================================
to remove yourself from this list please send email to
mailto:remove@selloffvacations.com
with the word ' remove ' in the subject line
